PHRASE.LANG:
Transform your avatar into one of these adorable cubs.
 
 These locomotion objects will boost your speed.
 
 Speed:
 ・Standard = 5.25m/s
 
 This bundle contains:
 (1) Animal Avatar - Cubs - Leopard
 (2) Animal Avatar - Cubs - Lion
 (3) Animal Avatar - Cubs - Brown Bear
 (4) Animal Avatar - Cubs - Polar Bear
 
 ※These items are portable items. [#Legal]
